properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aadaamavvalavale neevu saha Kevalamu digambarivai yunda Aa deva gorrepilla chavondi siluvalo Paavana vastramula nichchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhu yadugujadalanu parikinchi Prabhu kanukoolambugaa nadachinacho Haanokuvale aa rendava maranamu Nondaka prabhuto nundedavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishudda maina pravarthanalo Prabhu sarvaanga kavachamun kalgi Neethin prakatinchina Novahun boli Khyathi suvaarthan chatumilan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mrutulanu sahalepu mahaatmyudani Thana sutu narpinche nabrahamu Mrutiki lonagu nee sharirambunu Athanike baligaa narpinchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
v7
